title: Bug 138175: Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
EB: The selected bookmark is not displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog, although it is successfully saved in the XML source.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Hyperlink Options dialog.
2. Set a bookmark link in a drill through link.
3. Close and reopen the Hyperlink Options dialog.
